summary: TAKATA RECALL  CURRENTLY MY PASSANGER AIRBAG IS NOT FLUSHED WITH THE REST OF THE CAR.  I AM VERY CONCERNED SINCE I HAVE MY 5 YEAR OLD GRANDDAUGHTER IN MY CAR DAILY WHILE MY SON IS DEPLOYED FOR OUR COUNTRY.  ALSO I MY HUSBAND AND DAUGHTER IN LAW SITS IN THE PASSANGER SEAT.  I WOULD LIKE TO GIVE THIS CAR TO MY SON BUT I AM VERY CONCERNED ABOUT WHAT COULD HAPPEN.  THIS RECALL HAS BEEN ABOUT 2 YEARS, THIS IS BEYOND BEING TIMELY
